markdownRemark.html:
Hi Friends üëã,

Welcome To aGuideHub!

To make mui typography with underline in React js, you can use this code sx={{textDecoration: 'underline'}}. It will make mui typography with underline in react js.

Today, I am going to show you, how to make mui typography with underline in react js.

Installation

Install the following packages to use mui typography in react js.

npm

npm install @mui/material @emotion/react @emotion/styled

yarn

yarn add @mui/material @emotion/react @emotion/styled

Table of contents

  • Install MUI and create a new React app.
  • Import Material-UI Typography.
  • Make mui typography with underline Component.

Step 1: Install MUI and create a new React app.

First you have to install the React project. You should use create-react-app command to create a new React project.

npx create-react-app my-app
cd my-app
npm start

Step 2: Import Material-UI Typography.

After installing MUI, you have to import your React component. To do this, add the following line to the top of your component file.

import { Typography } from '@mui/material';

Step 3: Make mui typography with underline Component.

You can use the Typography component in your react js. For example, The typography component is used to create text. and textDecoration CSS property is set to underline.

<Typography variant="h6" sx={{ textDecoration: 'underline' }}>
    Hello Aastha.
</Typography>

MUI material make mui typography with underline example.

The code below is an example of making mui typography with an underline, setting the sx={{ textDecoration: 'underline' }} will create typography with an underline.

App.js

import { Typography } from '@mui/material';

export default function App() {
  return (
    <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ textDecoration: 'underline' }}>
      Hello Aastha.
    </Typography>
  );
}

In the above code example, I have used the @mui/material component and made mui typography with underline in react js.

Check the output of the above code example.

Here, we are provided code sandbox links for the above program make mui typography with underline in react js. Then you can use whenever you want and do the changes as per your requirements.

Try it Yourself

All the best üëç
